memberships.description: Access to basic facilities (gym, weights, cardio machines).
benefits: Affordable price
Limited access to machines and weights during specific hours (e.g., no peak hours)
Ideal for people looking for a flexible, low-cost option
memberships.idealFor: People seeking an economical and flexible option

memberships.description: Includes full access to all gym areas.
benefits: Unlimited access to all machines and weights without time restrictions
Includes access to functional training rooms, group classes like yoga, spinning, or pilates
Ideal for regular clients seeking more flexibility and access to additional services
memberships.idealFor: Regular customers looking for more flexibility and services

memberships.description: Full access with additional comfort and services.
benefits: Access to all areas and classes
Exclusive use of areas such as saunas, steam baths, jacuzzis, and relaxation zones
Complimentary towels, premium hygiene products, and private lockers
High-intensity group classes with specialized trainers
Ideal for clients who value comfort and exclusivity
memberships.idealFor: Clients who value comfort and exclusivity

memberships.description: Shared access for a family group.
benefits: Discounts on monthly fees when adding multiple family members
Specific activities for all ages, including kids' classes, youth and adult training
Safe, supervised areas for children while parents train
Ideal for families wanting to work out together and seeking safe options for kids
memberships.idealFor: Families wanting to work out together and seeking safe options for kids

benefits: Regular personal training sessions
Fitness assessments, personalized nutrition plans, and progress tracking
Priority access to certain gym areas and high-end equipment
Ideal for people seeking specific results or a supervised training plan
memberships.idealFor: People looking for specific results with professional supervision

memberships.description: Virtual training programs for working out from home.
benefits: Access to an online platform with live and recorded classes
Monthly training plans and challenges
Virtual consultations with trainers for guidance and workout plans
Ideal for people who prefer or need to work out from home with online flexibility
memberships.idealFor: People who prefer or need to train from home with online workouts
